channel.title: Creating ice over on pics[req]
channel.description:
I am requesting an iceover effect,
For this one i was thinking a little bit of frost in the top left corner, and a little bit in about half way but not all the way to the bottom or right [img]http://s102.ucoz.net/t/991/6.gif[/img] For this one, i was thinkin the same thing only a little bit stronger, but still able to see the brown [img]http://s102.ucoz.net/t/991/7.jpg[/img] This i want complely frozen, as if there were an inch of ice on it or so [img]http://s102.ucoz.net/t/991/10.gif[/img] same for this only just to the left side and ive sicles comeing from the bottom [img]http://s102.ucoz.net/t/991/11.gif[/img] For this i wanted like a waterdrop that froze feeling and front over the top right again like number 1, but instead of it going into the left, make it go down about 1/3rd of the way? [img]http://s102.ucoz.net/t/991/12.jpg[/img] same for this [img]http://s102.ucoz.net/t/991/13.jpg[/img] same with this [img]http://s102.ucoz.net/t/991/14.jpg[/img] frost this up as if it was stuck in a freezer i guess. (i dont realy knowhow to explain that) [img]http://s102.ucoz.net/t/991/15.gif[/img] This to [img]http://s102.ucoz.net/t/991/16.gif[/img] for this i was hopeing ice crystals on the top and ice sicles on the top going down half way(mini ones abut 4-7) [img]http://s102.ucoz.net/t/991/17.gif[/img] for this one i was hopeing posibly the same as the one that looks like this (there not the same) [img]http://s102.ucoz.net/t/991/18.jpg[/img] Posibly completly frozen horn, with like small ice sicles on the left tip, about 4 (mini mini ones) http://s102.ucoz.net/t/991/19.gif
